publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2648 Mr Keith Harding: Jobs Announcements for Fife Economy-That the Parliament welcomes the jobs boost to Fife's economy following the announcements that RAF Leuchars is set to expand with a new squadron stationed at the base and that the Child Support Agency is to create over 200 jobs in Kirkcaldy at a site that will handle claims from both Scotland and England.
S1M-2648 Jobs Announcements for Fife Economy (lodged on 25 January 2002) Marilyn Livingstone*
S1M-2648 Jobs Announcements for Fife Economy (lodged on 25 January 2002) Mr Brian Monteith*, Mary Scanlon*
S1M-2648 Jobs Announcements for Fife Economy (lodged on 25 January 2002) Murdo Fraser*
S1M-2648 Jobs Announcements for Fife Economy (lodged on 25 January 2002) Mr Keith Raffan*
S1M-2648 Jobs Announcements for Fife Economy (lodged on 25 January 2002) Tricia Marwick*
